alert.note: Alert for Mississippi; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 22 at 8:10PM CST until February 27 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas... Right Hand Chute Little River at Rivervale For the Little River...including Rivervale...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT TO EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Right Hand Chute Little River at Rivervale. * WHEN...From late Friday night to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Farm land north of Rivervale is flooded. Low-lying portions of Highway 158 near the river are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 9.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain above 9 feet for the next several days. It is forecast to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 11.0 feet. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
